pages.text: Qilinyu is an early placoderm from the Silurian and it exhibited many of the features of later placoderms such a head shield that ended after the first pair of fins and a longer tail.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
